plot: The serious-minded Tsumiki and the pure-hearted Io feel they never want to be parted, and yet they haven't fallen in love yet. More than friends but not lovers, they develop an awkward quasi-romance.
opening_theme: "Acchi de Kocchi de(あっちでこっちで)" by Acchi⇔Kocchi
ending_theme: "Te o Gyuushite ne (手をギュしてね)" by Rumi Ookubo
